name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Data Engineer with proven expertise in **SQL**, **Python**, and **ETL** processes, including **SSIS** and **Airflow** for efficient data integration and transformation. Skilled in leveraging **Snowflake** for data warehousing and proficient in **Azure** and **GCP** cloud platforms to implement scalable data solutions. Experienced with **REST** and **gRPC** APIs, alongside knowledge of **Kafka** for data streaming and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration. Adept in **Data Mesh** architecture, embracing **DevOps** methodologies, and excelling in **Agile** environments including **Scrum** frameworks. Recognized for delivering complex projects in diverse sectors such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, focused on automation, robust architectures, and maintaining clean, efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed robust ETL processes using **Python** and **Airflow**, managing data workflows with a focus on maintaining data integrity and efficiency across systems.
Utilized **SQL** to optimize queries for data extraction and transformation, improving data processing speed by 50%.
Implemented data pipeline orchestration with **Apache Kafka** and **gRPC**, ensuring real-time data availability and reducing latency by **40%**.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment, participating in daily scrums and bi-weekly sprint planning, resulting in a **25%** increase in team productivity.
Designed and maintained cloud-based data warehousing solutions using **Snowflake**, achieving a **99%** uptime and facilitating quick data retrieval.
Managed deployment workflows and version control using **Git**, supporting the continuous integration and delivery of data engineering projects.
Engaged in DevOps practices, applying **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and ensuring seamless deployment across cloud environments including **Azure** and **GCP**.
Conducted performance tuning on existing ETL processes, leading to a **30%** reduction in processing times and improved reliability.

Utilized **SQL** for querying large datasets and developing complex data pipelines to support data engineering processes.
Implemented **Python** scripts for ETL processes, optimizing data extraction and transformation workflows using **Airflow**, achieving a 30% improvement in data processing efficiency.
Designed and maintained data integration workflows with **SSIS**, efficiently managing data flow between multiple sources and **Snowflake**.
Developed and deployed microservices using **REST** and **gRPC** to facilitate data access and processing, streamlining communication between front-end and backend systems.
Leveraged **Kafka** for real-time data streaming, ensuring minimal latency in data delivery and achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
Applied **DevOps** principles for CI/CD workflows with **Git**, utilizing **Jenkins** and **Azure DevOps** to automate build and deployment processes, ensuring version control and reducing deployment time by **40%**.
Managed cloud infrastructure on **Azure** and **GCP**, utilizing **Kubernetes** for orchestration and scaling, resulting in a **50%** reduction in infrastructure costs.
Conducted agile project management using **Scrum** methodologies, ensuring timely delivery of data engineering projects while maintaining high-quality standards.

Leveraged **SQL** to design and optimize data pipelines, enhancing efficiency by 25%.
Utilized **Python** for ETL processes, streamlining data ingestion and processing across **Azure** and **GCP**.
Implemented data orchestration with **Apache Airflow**, automating data workflows and reducing manual tasks by 50%.
Developed robust data solutions using **Snowflake**, significantly improving query performance by 35%.
Collaborated with teams employing **Git** for version control, ensuring smooth deployments with **DevOps** practices.
Participated in **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies, enhancing project delivery on-time by 20%.
Designed and maintained REST and **gRPC** services for seamless data access across the architecture, achieving 95% success rate for queries.
Managed containerized applications using **Kubernetes**, facilitating scalable environments to support growing data loads.

skills:
